```{r}
colnames(Adult_dummy_del)[colnames(Adult_dummy_del)=="income..50K"] = "income"
```

```{r}
set.seed(400)
ctrl = trainControl(method = "cv", 
                     number = 10, 
                     sampling = "smote")

start_time = Sys.time()
knnFit = train(Adult_dummy_del[,predictorset], Adult_dummy_del[,"income"], method = "knn", trControl = ctrl, tuneLength = 10)
end_time = Sys.time()
print(knnFit)
plot(knnFit)
```

```{r}

rfFit <- train(income ~ ., data = Adult_dummy_del, method = "rf", trControl = ctrl, tuneLength = 10, metric = "ROC")

plot(rfFit)
```
